column5: Entire 2 story Charming Home in ideal Location. Walk to TCU, BlueBonnet Circle. Fantastic for TCU Football, Baseball and Parents Weekends! Perfect for visiting Fort Worth Zoo, Magnolia Ave, Fort Worth Stockyards, Medical District, Cowboys Stadium, Rangers Ballpark, Downtown and More. Wonderful opportunity for weekend or longer get-a-way. A very Comfortable, Fun and Happy Home! Welcome!
column8: Hailey's House-TCU, Colonial Golf, Downtown, Zoo
